display_long_description:
Flight Simulator : Aviassembly is a unique and immersive flight simulation game that combines aircraft construction, open-world exploration, and mission-based gameplay. Set in a vibrant, physics-driven environment, players take on the role of an aspiring aviator and engineer, tasked with designing, building, and piloting custom airplanes from the ground up. Whether you’re assembling your first basic plane or creating complex, multi-part aircraft, every detail of your design affects performance and flight dynamics.

Once airborne, you’ll explore a diverse and expansive world filled with missions and secrets. Deliver cargo, transport passengers, complete timed challenges, and earn money to unlock better parts and upgrades. The game offers a progression system that rewards creativity and efficiency, pushing players to refine their designs and master realistic flight controls. For those who prefer a relaxed experience, Creative Mode provides unlimited parts and freedom to experiment without resource constraints.

With charming low-poly graphics, intuitive building mechanics, and an engaging balance between simulation and creativity, Flight Simulator : Aviassembly delivers a satisfying experience for both aviation enthusiasts and sandbox game lovers. Whether you're in it for precision flying or imaginative aircraft engineering, Flight Simulator : Aviassembly offers endless skies to explore.
